headline: Lennox Schedules Fourth Quarter Results and 2026 Guidance Conference Call
summary: Lennox (NYSE: LII), a leader in energy-efficient climate control solutions, will report fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results before the market opens on Wednesday, January 28, 2026. The company will also provide guidance for FY 2026. An earnings conference call and webcast are scheduled for the same day at 8:30 a.m. Central Time. CEO Alok Maskara and CFO Michael Quenzer will provide a summary of the company's financial results and outlook, followed by a question-and-answer session.
